title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$x-y>3$$, which rearranges to $$y<x-3$$. We make the line dashed and shade below it since we have <.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y<\frac{-1}{5} x+4$$. We make the line dashed and shade below it since we have <.\n##figure3.gif##
speech: We must graph  y is less than fraction, negative 1, over 5,  x plus 4 . We make the line dashed and shade below it since we have <.\n##figure3.gif##
